Article.ArticleTitle: SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19: A Narrative Review.

Abstract.AbstractText: The World Health Organisation has reported that the viral disease known as COVID-19, caused by SARS-CoV-2, is the leading cause of death by a single infectious agent. This narrative review examines certain components of the pandemic: its origins, early clinical data, global and UK-focussed epidemiology, vaccination, variants, and long COVID.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: School of Applied Sciences, University of Huddersfield Queensgate, Huddersfield, United Kingdom.
School of Applied Sciences, University of Huddersfield Queensgate, Huddersfield, United Kingdom.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a potential conflict of interest.
